chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl)

Premises:
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
union_mpl_0 = fix union_mpl_0 (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M1 prec_list c pl | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => if (c =? c0)%N then M1 prec_list c (union_pl pl pl0) else MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match c with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s0) s1 | N.pos (p'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s1) | N.pos (p'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
state = Map prec_list : Set
union_s0d : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) s -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl s) (app c tl)
union_s_prd0 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) s -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_s_prd1 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_s0d_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M0 prec_list) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M0 prec_list)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s1d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c0 : ad) (pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) -> c <> c0 -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c0 pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s1d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> a <> c -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (app 0%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 0%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 0%N tl)
union_s0d_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (app 1%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 1%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 1%N tl)
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
u_conv0_1r : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_0_r d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_0_r d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
semantic_equiv_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), pre_reconnait d l tl l0 -> st_reconnait d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_merge_3_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_inv_1_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_inv_1_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_merge_4_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_invr_0_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_invr_0_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_conv0_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_0 d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_0 d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_merge_5_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_invr_1_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_invr_1_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_conv1_1r : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_1_r d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_1_r d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_conv1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_conv_lr_1 d l tl l0 -> u_conv_str_1 d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
u_merge_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), u_merge_inv_0_lst d l tl l0 -> u_merge_inv_0_st d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
mpl_compat_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 c pl s) c = Some (union_pl pl l)
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
mpl_compat_8 : forall (s : state) (a c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> a <> c -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 a pl s) c = Some l
mpl_compat_7_def = fun s : state => forall (c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 c pl s) c = Some (union_pl pl l) : state -> Prop
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mpl_compat_8_def = fun s : state => forall (a c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> a <> c -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 a pl s) c = Some l : state -> Prop
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
conservation_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (l : term_list), prec_in_dta d p -> S (essence_list l d p) <= essence (app c l) d
u_conv_1_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p)
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
rec_consn : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
u_conv0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), u_conv_str_0 d ladj t s -> u_conv_rec_0 d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)
u_merge_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), u_merge_inv_0_st d ladj t s -> u_merge_inv_0_dta d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)
u_merge_4_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), u_merge_invr_0_st d ladj t s -> u_merge_invr_0_dta d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)
u_conv1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), u_conv_str_1 d ladj t s -> u_conv_rec_1 d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)
u_conv0_0r : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), u_conv_str_0_r d ladj t s -> u_conv_rec_0_r d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)

```      
intros s d a pl c tl H1 H2.
unfold union_mpl_0.
destruct s.
- simpl in H2. assumption.
- simpl. destruct (N.eqb c a) eqn:Eq.
  + rewrite <- e. rewrite <- e in H2. exact H2.
  + apply mpl_compat_7 in H1. apply union_s_prd1 with (s:=s) (c:=c) (tl:=tl) in H2. exact H2.
    apply H1. apply Eq. apply n.
```

original: intros s d a pl c tl H1 H2. unfold union_mpl_0. destruct s. - simpl in H2. auto. - simpl. destruct (N.eqb c a) eqn:Eq. + rewrite <- e. rewrite <- e in H2. apply H2. + apply mpl_compat_7 in H1. apply union_s_prd1 with (s:=s) (c:=c) (tl:=tl) in H2. apply H2. apply H1. apply Eq. apply n.
